        public static java.lang.String wrapInHtmlLines(java.lang.CharSequence... lines)
        Parameters:
        lines - Text to be used for example in multi-line labels
        Returns:
        HTML where specified lines separated by <br> and each line wrapped in <nobr> to prevent breaking text inside

      • convertToHtmlContent

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtmlContent(java.lang.String text)
        Converts text to a string which can be used inside an HTML document: if it's already an HTML text the root html/body tags will be stripped, if it's a plain text special characters will be escaped

      • escapeIllegalXmlChars

        public static java.lang.String escapeIllegalXmlChars(java.lang.String text)
        Some characters are illegal in XML even as numerical character references. This method performs escaping of them in a custom format, which is supposed to be unescaped on retrieving from XML using unescapeIllegalXmlChars(String). Resulting text can be part of XML version 1.0 document.
        See Also:
        https://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-controls, Verifier#isXMLCharacter(int)

      • unescapeIllegalXmlChars

        public static java.lang.String unescapeIllegalXmlChars(java.lang.String text)
        See Also:
        escapeIllegalXmlChars(String)
